participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and quirky, enjoys hands-on activities and has a love for classic cars.
participant_1.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a playful spirit that shines through in her hobbies.
participant_2.background: i am an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
